con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert 1 == slurperresponse.size()

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == "2016-08"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == "2016-08-17"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert 1 == slurperresponse.size()

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == "2016-08"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.size() == 0

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse[0].date == "2016-08"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date == "2016-08-17"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1234" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.comment == "1stcomm"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse[0].date == "2016-08"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.size() == 0

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse[0].days[0].date == "2016-08-17"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1234" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 30

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1234" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 8 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 45

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.size() == 1

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1234" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.comment == ""

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "LT-4321" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.comment == ""

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "LT-4321" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 6 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 45 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 7 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.comment == ""

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "LT-4321" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 6 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 45 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 12 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.comment == ""

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "LT-4321" assert slurperresponse.startTime.hour == 6 assert slurperresponse.startTime.minute == 45 assert slurperresponse.endTime.hour == 12 assert slurperresponse.endTime.minute == 30 assert slurperresponse.comment == "hello"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.taskId == "1111" assert slurperresponse.startTime == slurperresponse.endTime assert slurperresponse.comment == "hello ooo ooo"
